name: Yavin 4: Jedi Academy
LocationDStext: While opponent's non-[Episode I] Jedi here, destiny draws for Sense and Alter may not be modified.  (Original concept by Charles Clarkson - New York States 2006)
LocationLStext: If a Dark Jedi on table, Force drain -1 here. Once per game, may deploy Jedi Luke here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
